title: Soto slams 426-foot HR in 1st at-bat with Mets
description: Juan Soto homered in his first spring training at-bat for his new team, hitting a solo shot to left-center field in the first inning for the Mets in their 6-2 win over the Astros.

title: Source: Rams let Stafford's agent gauge value
description: The Rams have given quarterback Matthew Stafford's agent permission to speak to other teams about his market value, a source confirmed to ESPN.
author: Sarah Barshop

title: Why Guardiola's tactics stopped working amid rise of rapid football
description: BBC Sport analyses why Pep Guardiola's possession-focused tactics have stopped working amid the rise in rapid, direct football.

title: Bivol dethrones Beterbiev in thrilling revenge win
description: Russian Dmitry Bivol produces a masterclass to gain revenge over compatriot Artur Beterbiev and win the undisputed light-heavyweight world title.

title: Dmitry Bivol edges Artur Beterbiev in brilliant rematch
description: Dmitry Bivol righted a wrong with perhaps the most brilliant performance of what will surely be a Hall of Fame career.
author: Uncrowned

title: Gregg Popovich reportedly not expected to return to Spurs this season, future uncertain after suffering stroke
description: It's been a tough week for the Spurs.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Bivol takes brilliant revenge win over Beterbiev in undisputed fight
description: Dmitry Bivol took a revenge win to defeat Artur Beterbiev and become the new undisputed light-heavyweight champion of the world.

title: Parker ends Bakole's fairy-tale title bid with crushing KO
description: Joseph Parker took just two rounds to knock out Martin Bakole, a top-tier heavyweight who came in at the shortest possible notice to replace Daniel Dubois, at the ANB Arena in Riyadh.
